All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Adder
this class generate the VHDL code for the HalfAdder and FullAdder
AppVG
this class start the welcome screen for the Application
Comparator
this class generate the VHDL Code for the Comparator
ComponentUtil
some utility method for frame/pane creation
Decoder
this class generate the code for the Decoder
Demux
this class generate the code of the Demultiplexer chosen by the user.
DFlipFlop
this class generate the VHDL code of a D-flip-flop
DisplayLibrary
this class display the component Library
Editor
this class create a TextEditor to write VHDL CODE.
Encoder
this class generate the VHDL code of the Encoder
FileGenerator
this class generate the code for the VHDL file. this class take information from the class Port and write those information to the file.
JKFlipFlop
this class generate the VHDL code of a JK-flip-flop
Library
this class hold library available
LinePainter
this class Track the movement of the Caret by painting the background line at the current caret/cursor position.
Mux
this class generate the Code for the Multiplexer
Port
this class hold the Port information about the VHDL code to write to the file.
PriorityEncoder
this class generate the VHDL code for the PriorityEncoder.
Segment7
this class generate the VHDL code of the segment7 display in VHDL.
Subtractor
this class generate the VHDL code for a Subtractor
SymbolType
this interface determine the type of the VHDL symbol language (KEYWORDS,Data Types,Operators,...)
SyntaxHighlighting
this class do the syntax highlighting for the VHDL LANG KEYWORDS
Testbench
This class generate a VHDL testbench template for a VHDL unit
TFlipFlop
this class generate the VHDL code of the TFlipFlop
Token
this class determine what type of Symbol we have and his value.
VhdlSyntax
scanner for the VHDL programming language
WindowCode
This class generate a GUI for the application and takes input from the user using a form then pass those information to the class @see FileGenerator to generate the file
